scienceStream.description: Best for students interested in Engineering, Medicine, Research, IT, etc.

pathways.title: Engineering
pathways.description: Designing, developing, and maintaining systems, structures, machines, and processes to solve technical problems.
pathways.requirements: Class 12 with PCM (Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics), followed by B.Tech/B.E. degree through JEE or other engineering entrance exams.

pathways.title: Medicine
pathways.description: Diagnose and treat illnesses, diseases and injuries in patients. Provide preventive healthcare advice and promote wellbeing.
pathways.requirements: Class 12 with PCB (Physics, Chemistry, Biology), followed by MBBS degree through NEET entrance exam.

pathways.title: Research Scientist
pathways.description: Conduct experiments, analyze data and develop new products or improve existing ones in fields like biology, chemistry or physics.
pathways.requirements: Class 12 with PCM/PCB, followed by Bachelor's and usually Master's/PhD in specific scientific discipline.

commerceStream.description: Best for students interested in Business, Finance, Law, Management

pathways.title: Chartered Accountant (CA)
pathways.description: Provide financial advice, audit accounts and provide trustworthy information about financial records. Handle taxation and financial consulting.
pathways.requirements: Class 12 Commerce, followed by CA course through ICAI with articleship training.

pathways.title: Company Secretary (CS)
pathways.description: Ensure compliance with statutory and regulatory requirements and implement decisions made by the board of directors.
pathways.requirements: Class 12 Commerce, followed by CS course through ICSI.

pathways.title: Finance Analyst
pathways.description: Analyze financial information, prepare reports and forecasts, and help businesses make sound investment decisions.
pathways.requirements: Class 12 Commerce with Mathematics, followed by Bachelor's in Finance, Commerce or Business Administration.

artsStream.description: Best for Creative minds, Social Science lovers, Writers, Lawyers

pathways.title: Journalist
pathways.description: Research, investigate and report news stories through various media platforms like newspapers, television, radio and digital media.
pathways.requirements: Class 12 Arts, followed by Bachelor's in Journalism and Mass Communication or related field.
entrance_exams: Entrance exams for specific journalism schools

pathways.title: Psychologist
pathways.description: Study human behavior and mental processes to help individuals overcome emotional and psychological challenges.
pathways.requirements: Class 12 Arts with Psychology, followed by Bachelor's and Master's in Psychology.

pathways.title: Lawyer
pathways.description: Provide legal advice and representation to individuals, organizations or government bodies in various legal matters.
pathways.requirements: Class 12 Arts, followed by 5-year integrated law degree or 3-year LLB after bachelor's degree.

pathways.title: Mechanical Engineering Technician
pathways.description: Assist engineers in designing, developing, and testing mechanical devices and systems.
pathways.requirements: Class 10 pass, followed by 3-year Mechanical Engineering Diploma from a Polytechnic institute.

pathways.title: Fashion Design Assistant
pathways.description: Support fashion designers in creating clothing designs, selecting fabrics, and preparing for fashion shows.
pathways.requirements: Class 10 pass, followed by 3-year Fashion Design Diploma from a Polytechnic institute.

itiCourses.description: Industrial Training Institute courses with 1-2 years duration

pathways.title: Electrician
pathways.description: Install, maintain and repair electrical systems in homes, businesses and factories, ensuring they operate safely and efficiently.
pathways.requirements: Class 10 pass, followed by ITI certification in Electrician trade (1-2 years).

pathways.title: Computer Operator
pathways.description: Manage and operate computer systems, handle data entry, process documents, and maintain digital records and files.
pathways.requirements: Class 10 pass, followed by ITI certification in Computer Operator and Programming Assistant (COPA) trade.

designAndFineArts.description: Courses in animation, graphic design, fashion design and more

pathways.title: Graphic Designer
pathways.description: Create visual concepts using computer software or by hand to communicate ideas that inspire, inform, or captivate consumers.
pathways.requirements: Class 12 pass (any stream), followed by diploma or degree in Graphic Design.

pathways.title: Animator
pathways.description: Create moving images through various animation techniques for films, television, video games, and digital media.
pathways.requirements: Class 12 pass (any stream), followed by specialized course in Animation.

computerAndCoding.description: Learn coding in Python, Web Development, App Development via online platforms

pathways.title: Web Developer
pathways.description: Build and maintain websites by writing code, ensuring mobile-responsive design, and implementing user-friendly features.
pathways.requirements: Class 12 pass (any stream), followed by coding bootcamp or self-learning through online platforms.

pathways.title: Mobile App Developer
pathways.description: Design, develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS, Android or cross-platform use.
pathways.requirements: Class 12 pass (any stream), followed by app development courses through online platforms or coding bootcamps.

openSchooling.description: Flexible for students who want to study non-traditionally or repeat 10th/12th

integratedPrograms.description: Example: 5-year integrated law, BCA+MCA, science programs, or coaching + school
